section.title: MarkAllUpdatedExceptBulk Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Removes all change-rows for an array of zones and nameserver except the ones with specific ids.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void MarkAllUpdatedExceptBulk( string[] zones, int[] changeids )

tr.td: zones to mark all updates as updated for
the ids of the change-rows to keep
